text:
After years of trying to quit smoking, drinking, drugging for #Lent, I finally gave up Lent for Lent...and behold, I stopped smoking, drinking, drugging!

#AshWednesday #Lent2021 #wednesdaythought #WednesdayMotivation #TexasFreeze #Texas #COVID19 #vaccine #AddictionRecovery https://t.co/f2mZOH1MrR
